Downloads.. end shieldsInstallation--------------.. start installation``apeye-core`` can be installed from PyPI or Anaconda.To install with ``pip``:.. code-block:: bash$ python -m pip install apeye-coreTo install with ``conda``:.. code-block:: bash$ conda install -c conda-forge apeye-core.. end installation
